titleStmt.title: A catalogue of the bishops of England, since the first planting of Christian religion in this island together with a briefe history of their liues and memorable actions, so neere as can be gathered out of antiquity. By F.G. subdeane of Exceter.
titleStmt.author: Godwin, Francis, 1562-1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Printed by Eliot's Court Press] Impensis Geor. Bishop,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
